mapper.select:
select
from td_activity
user_id = #{pd.userId}
and activity_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%')
and activitystart_time >= #{pd.start}
and activitystart_time <= #{pd.end}
and online_status =0 and activity_status !=2
and activity_status = #{pd.activityStatus} and online_status !=4
and online_status in(1,3)
and online_status =4
and online_status !=4
and online_status !=4
order by updated desc

#{item}
